summary:
Crypto Means Business - Using proven crypto and blockchain technology honed over a decade, Ripple’s enterprise blockchain solutions for finance are faster, more transparent, and more cost-effective than traditional financial services. Our customers use these solutions to source crypto assets, facilitate instant payments, empower their treasury, engage new audiences, lower capital requirements, and drive new revenue.

 Prajit Nanu - Co-Founder and CEO at Nium

 Surangel Whipps Jr. - President of Palau

 Jacky Lee - Group CEO of Tranglo
